name: ORB (itch) (Robert "Blaster391" Arnold, jaybaus, ProductShard)
description:
This game uses compute shaders for lighting effects, if you have any problems (or just want to see the difference) the lighting effects can be toggled by pressing the 1 and 2 keys

OBJECTIVE

Keep the Orb alive for as long as possible! 

The orb is constantly losing energy, but can absorb more from nearby crystals. Beware, the crystals have a limited supply! 

Sacrifice your orbs energy to build defences to try to hold off endless waves of aliens. The enemies strength will continue to grow, so keep moving to keep alive.

Controls

We highly recommend you play the tutorial!

  • Move: A/D
  • Jump: Space
  • Pickup Item: F
  • Open Shop: E (With Orb Held)
  • Throw Held Item: Mouse 1 (Hold for stronger throw)
  • Force Push: Mouse 1 (Hold for stronger push) (Hands must be empty)
  • Force Grab: Mouse 2 (Hold for stronger pull) (Hands must be empty)
  • Toggle Lighting: 1/2
